text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern sind folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiß zu haben, als: 1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Coena Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR>. das Exemplar in albo achthalben <PRICE>bz.</PRICE></BIBL> 2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR>. à <PRICE>10. Batzen,</PRICE> und auff Schreib-papier <PRICE>14. Batzen.</PRICE></BIBL> 3. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1713</YEAR>. à <PRICE>8 Batzen.</PRICE></BIBL> 4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Catechetischer Leüchter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebätt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR>. mit dem Kupffer-Blatt haltet <PRICE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRICE> à <PRICE>5. Batzen.</PRICE></BIBL> 5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> à <PRICE>15. Batzen.</PRICE></BIBL> 6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegründete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE> gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Psalms <FORMAT>v. 1.</FORMAT> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1704</YEAR>. à <PRICE>5. Batzen.</PRICE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":15,"explanation":"Fixed the following issues: 1) Corrected 'und' to 'sind' in opening text, 2) Fixed Unicode characters representing umlauts and special characters throughout (√∂ to ü, √ü to ß, etc.), 3) Changed 'PRIZE' tags to 'PRICE' tags for consistency, 4) Fixed closing tag mismatch in item 6 (</PRICE> instead of </PRIZE>), 5) Added missing period after 'Christ' in item 3, 6) Corrected 'Ccena' to 'Coena' in item 1, 7) Fixed 'Eremplar' to 'Exemplar', 8) Changed '√†' to 'à' (meaning 'at/for' in pricing), 9) Fixed 'Carechetischer Le√bachter' to 'Catechetischer Leüchter', 10) Corrected 'Gebatt' to 'Gebätt', 11) Fixed 'Btatt' to 'Blatt', 12) Changed 'Rein' to 'Bern' in item 5 for consistency with location, 13) Fixed 'vest-gegrundete' to 'vest-gegründete', 14) Fixed 'un√baberwindliche' to 'unüberwindliche', 15) Changed '9. 1.' to 'v. 1.' (verse 1) in item 6."}

parsed.explanation: Fixed the following issues: 1) Corrected 'und' to 'sind' in opening text, 2) Fixed Unicode characters representing umlauts and special characters throughout (√∂ to ü, √ü to ß, etc.), 3) Changed 'PRIZE' tags to 'PRICE' tags for consistency, 4) Fixed closing tag mismatch in item 6 (</PRICE> instead of </PRIZE>), 5) Added missing period after 'Christ' in item 3, 6) Corrected 'Ccena' to 'Coena' in item 1, 7) Fixed 'Eremplar' to 'Exemplar', 8) Changed '√†' to 'à' (meaning 'at/for' in pricing), 9) Fixed 'Carechetischer Le√bachter' to 'Catechetischer Leüchter', 10) Corrected 'Gebatt' to 'Gebätt', 11) Fixed 'Btatt' to 'Blatt', 12) Changed 'Rein' to 'Bern' in item 5 for consistency with location, 13) Fixed 'vest-gegrundete' to 'vest-gegründete', 14) Fixed 'un√baberwindliche' to 'unüberwindliche', 15) Changed '9. 1.' to 'v. 1.' (verse 1) in item 6.
